meanings.definition: A mathematical concept used in theoretical physics.
meanings.sent1: In class, we learned about the twistor and its role in physics.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a twistor to explain the complex theory.
meanings.sent3: Why did the twistor refuse to attend the math party? It had too many imaginary friends!
meanings.sent4: The twistor unraveled the mysteries of the universe like a key unlocking a hidden door.
meanings.sent5: The twistor danced across the chalkboard, revealing the secrets of the cosmos.

meanings.definition: A type of mathematical object used in the study of spacetime.
meanings.sent1: The twistor helped us visualize the curvature of spacetime.
meanings.sent2: She used a twistor to map out the dimensions of the universe.
meanings.sent3: Why did the twistor bring a ruler to the geometry party? To measure up to the competition!
meanings.sent4: The twistor twisted through dimensions like a cosmic puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent5: The twistor shimmered with the beauty of mathematical elegance, revealing the secrets of the universe.
